name: Shepherd (FloppyDisk57)
description:
This game was made for BenBonk#4 gamejam.

My 4 colors are: 483838,42855b,90b77d,d2d79f.
-------------------------------------------------------------

Your farm has been overran by wolves, who haven't eaten in a while.

Your task is to protect your sheep from wolves, in which your loyal companion may help.

Protect your farm for as long as possible.

------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Hold down left-mouse button and drag to move sheep

----------------------------------------------------

P.S. quit button doesn't work in browser.
